content: -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **simple yet effective** - tin can knits -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- *this simple little pattern knits up quick and it s perfect for that special skein who could ask for more * **want to keep up with tin can knits ** sign up for our email updates 1 and we will let you know about our new designs 2 and great in-depth tutorials 3 -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **pattern info** **sizing ** one size 20 45 inches around and 10 inches high easily adjustable **materials ** 200 400 yards dk weight yarn sample shown in sweet fiber cashmere dk in marshland **gauge ** 22 sts & 28 rounds per 4 inches in stockinette **needles ** us #6 / 4 mm * or as required to meet gauge * **helpful tutorials** casting on for knitting in the round 4 -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- for all pattern abbreviations techniques and to contact us visit www tincanknits com 5 1 http //eepurl com/k5p8l 2 http //tincanknits com/ 3 http //tincanknits com/techniques html 4 http //blog tincanknits com/2013/08/17/casting-on-to-circulars/ 5 http //www tincanknits com
